column2: The Mandala System is a way to organize a state as a circle, or mandala in sanskrit, around a center of power. The Leaders of Mandala realms acknowledged that they can no longer hope to effectively govern the realms after the pre-event infrastructure has decayed beyond repair, instead they seek to empower their powerbase by waging war for prestige and tribute or giving alms to monks and holy men for piety and political clout.
